text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
Admiration! The way you train yourself
so diligently is truly graceful!

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
Allow me to observe for a while!
—Now, back to training… and work hard!
… She was impressed with our practice.
